entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:27 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:27 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:27 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
